card.name: Ambition's Cost
card.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Balance of Power
card.text: If target opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

card.name: Blaze
card.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Borrowing 100,000 Arrows
card.text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Borrowing the East Wind
card.text: Borrowing the East Wind deals X damage to each creature with horsemanship and each player.

card.name: Brilliant Plan
card.text: Draw three cards.

card.name: Broken Dam
card.text: Tap one or two target creatures without horsemanship.

card.name: Burning Fields
card.text: Burning Fields deals 5 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Burning of Xinye
card.text: You destroy four lands you control, then target opponent destroys four lands he or she controls. Then Burning of Xinye deals 4 damage to each creature.

card.name: Cao Cao, Lord of Wei
card.text: {T}: Target opponent discards two cards. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Cao Ren, Wei Commander
card.text: Horsemanship When Cao Ren, Wei Commander enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

card.name: Capture of Jingzhou
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Champion's Victory
card.text: Cast Champion's Victory only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Return target attacking creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Coercion
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Control of the Court
card.text: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.

card.name: Corrupt Court Official
card.text: When Corrupt Court Official enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Corrupt Eunuchs
card.text: When Corrupt Eunuchs enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Council of Advisors
card.text: When Council of Advisors enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Counterintelligence
card.text: Return one or two target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Cunning Advisor
card.text: {T}: Target opponent discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Deception
card.text: Target opponent discards two cards.

card.name: Desert Sandstorm
card.text: Desert Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each creature.

card.name: Desperate Charge
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Diaochan, Artful Beauty
card.text: {T}: Destroy target creature of your choice, then destroy target creature of an opponent's choice. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Dong Zhou, the Tyrant
card.text: When Dong Zhou, the Tyrant enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to that player.

card.name: Eightfold Maze
card.text: Cast Eightfold Maze only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Empty City Ruse
card.text: Target opponent skips all combat phases of his or her next turn.

card.name: Eunuchs' Intrigues
card.text: Target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Other creatures he or she controls can't block this turn.

card.name: Exhaustion
card.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

card.name: Extinguish
card.text: Counter target sorcery spell.

card.name: False Defeat
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: False Mourning
card.text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Famine
card.text: Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Fire Ambush
card.text: Fire Ambush deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Fire Bowman
card.text: Sacrifice Fire Bowman: Fire Bowman deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Flanking Troops
card.text: Whenever Flanking Troops attacks, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Forced Retreat
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Ghostly Visit
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Guan Yu, Sainted Warrior
card.text: Horsemanship When Guan Yu, Sainted Warrior is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may shuffle Guan Yu into your library.

card.name: Guan Yu's 1,000-Li March
card.text: Destroy all tapped creatures.

card.name: Heavy Fog
card.text: Cast Heavy Fog only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

card.name: Hua Tuo, Honored Physician
card.text: {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Huang Zhong, Shu General
card.text: Huang Zhong, Shu General can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Hunting Cheetah
card.text: Whenever Hunting Cheetah deals damage to an opponent, you may search your library for a Forest card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Imperial Edict
card.text: Target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Destroy it.

card.name: Imperial Recruiter
card.text: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Imperial Seal
card.text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Kongming, "Sleeping Dragon"
card.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Kongming's Contraptions
card.text: {T}: Kongming's Contraptions deals 2 damage to target attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.

card.name: Lady Sun
card.text: {T}: Return Lady Sun and another target creature to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Liu Bei, Lord of Shu
card.text: Horsemanship Liu Bei, Lord of Shu gets +2/+2 as long as you control a permanent named Guan Yu, Sainted Warrior or a permanent named Zhang Fei, Fierce Warrior.

card.name: Lone Wolf
card.text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Loyal Retainers
card.text: Sacrifice Loyal Retainers: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Lu Bu, Master-at-Arms
card.text: Haste; horsemanship

card.name: Lu Su, Wu Advisor
card.text: {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Lu Xun, Scholar General
card.text: Horsemanship Whenever Lu Xun, Scholar General deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Ma Chao, Western Warrior
card.text: Horsemanship Whenever Ma Chao, Western Warrior attacks alone, it can't be blocked this combat.

card.name: Marshaling the Troops
card.text: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way.

card.name: Meng Huo, Barbarian King
card.text: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Misfortune's Gain
card.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

card.name: Mystic Denial
card.text: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

card.name: Overwhelming Forces
card.text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Pang Tong, "Young Phoenix"
card.text: {T}: Target creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Peach Garden Oath
card.text: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Poison Arrow
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Preemptive Strike
card.text: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Rally the Troops
card.text: Cast Rally the Troops only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Untap all creatures you control.

card.name: Ravages of War
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Ravaging Horde
card.text: When Ravaging Horde enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

card.name: Red Cliffs Armada
card.text: Red Cliffs Armada can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Return to Battle
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Riding Red Hare
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains horsemanship until end of turn.

card.name: Riding the Dilu Horse
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains horsemanship.

card.name: Rockslide Ambush
card.text: Rockslide Ambush deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Rolling Earthquake
card.text: Rolling Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without horsemanship and each player.

card.name: Sage's Knowledge
card.text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Shu Defender
card.text: Whenever Shu Defender blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Shu Farmer
card.text: {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Shu General
card.text: Vigilance; horsemanship

card.name: Shu Grain Caravan
card.text: When Shu Grain Caravan enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Shu Soldier-Farmers
card.text: When Shu Soldier-Farmers enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Sima Yi, Wei Field Marshal
card.text: Sima Yi, Wei Field Marshal's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

card.name: Slashing Tiger
card.text: Whenever Slashing Tiger becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Spoils of Victory
card.text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Spring of Eternal Peace
card.text: You gain 8 life.

card.name: Stalking Tiger
card.text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Stolen Grain
card.text: Stolen Grain deals 5 damage to target opponent. You gain 5 life.

card.name: Stone Catapult
card.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped nonblack creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Strategic Planning
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Sun Ce, Young Conquerer
card.text: Horsemanship When Sun Ce, Young Conquerer enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sun Quan, Lord of Wu
card.text: Creatures you control have horsemanship.

card.name: Taoist Mystic
card.text: Taoist Mystic can't be blocked by creatures with horsemanship.

card.name: Taunting Challenge
card.text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

card.name: Three Visits
card.text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Trained Cheetah
card.text: Whenever Trained Cheetah becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Trip Wire
card.text: Destroy target creature with horsemanship.

card.name: Vengeance
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Virtuous Charge
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Warrior's Oath
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

card.name: Warrior's Stand
card.text: Cast Warrior's Stand only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Wei Ambush Force
card.text: Whenever Wei Ambush Force attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wei Assassins
card.text: When Wei Assassins enters the battlefield, target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Destroy it.

card.name: Wei Night Raiders
card.text: Horsemanship Whenever Wei Night Raiders deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card.

card.name: Wielding the Green Dragon
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Wolf Pack
card.text: You may have Wolf Pack assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Wu Admiral
card.text: Wu Admiral gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls an Island.

card.name: Wu Longbowman
card.text: {T}: Wu Longbowman deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Wu Scout
card.text: Horsemanship When Wu Scout enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

card.name: Wu Spy
card.text: When Wu Spy enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of target player's library. Put one of them into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Wu Warship
card.text: Wu Warship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

card.name: Xiahou Dun, the One-Eyed
card.text: Horsemanship Sacrifice Xiahou Dun, the One-Eyed: Return target black card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Xun Yu, Wei Advisor
card.text: {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Yellow Scarves Cavalry
card.text: Horsemanship Yellow Scarves Cavalry can't block.

card.name: Yellow Scarves General
card.text: Horsemanship Yellow Scarves General can't block.

card.name: Yellow Scarves Troops
card.text: Yellow Scarves Troops can't block.

card.name: Young Wei Recruits
card.text: Young Wei Recruits can't block.

card.name: Yuan Shao, the Indecisive
card.text: Horsemanship Each creature you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Yuan Shao's Infantry
card.text: Whenever Yuan Shao's Infantry attacks alone, Yuan Shao's Infantry can't be blocked this combat.

card.name: Zhang Fei, Fierce Warrior
card.text: Vigilance; horsemanship

card.name: Zhang He, Wei General
card.text: Horsemanship Whenever Zhang He, Wei General attacks, each other creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Zhang Liao, Hero of Hefei
card.text: Whenever Zhang Liao, Hero of Hefei deals damage to an opponent, that opponent discards a card.

card.name: Zhao Zilong, Tiger General
card.text: Horsemanship Whenever Zhao Zilong, Tiger General blocks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Zhou Yu, Chief Commander
card.text: Zhou Yu, Chief Commander can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

card.name: Zhuge Jin, Wu Strategist
card.text: {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Zodiac Dragon
card.text: When Zodiac Dragon is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may return it to your hand.

card.name: Zuo Ci, the Mocking Sage
card.text: Hexproof Zuo Ci, the Mocking Sage can't be blocked by creatures with horsemanship.
